narrative_osint.incident_summary: A 14-year-old female was last seen at Richmond at 2025-10-03T21:57:00.728756+00:00. The child was reported missing by friend after failing to return home.

narrative_osint.movement_cues_text: Within 7 hours of disappearance, movement cues walked through mall corridor into adjacent store suggest travel southbound along US-29. A black 2024 Honda Passport was observed departing near Richmond, Virginia.

provenance._fulltext: A 14-year-old female was last seen at Richmond at 2025-10-03T21:57:00.728756+00:00. The child was reported missing by friend after failing to return home. Within 7 hours of disappearance, movement cues walked through mall corridor into adjacent store suggest travel southbound along US-29. A black 2024 Honda Passport was observed departing near Richmond, Virginia. Around 12 hours later, a store_employee reported someone matching the description (14-year-old female, wearing plaid shirt, denim pants, black sneakers) near Pulaski.
